testcase.name: Credit Card sorgusu
testcase.system-out: Given Faker api URL icin gerekli path param "credit_cards" ve query param "5"hazirla.passed Then Faker apiden gelen cevabi response kaydet..............................passed And Faker apiden donen response'da status "OK", code 200, total 5 oldugunu ve "type","number","expiration" ve "owner" alanlarinin geldigini assert et.passed
